channel.title: AFK command
channel.description: hi, does someone has a afk command for 317 server? i use garbo scape i already had a afk command but it doesnt do anything so if some can help me or send me a afk command then 100X thanks :) greetz dane

item.title: AFK command
item.dc:creator: @robotragepub robotragepub
item.description:
@robotragepub wrote:

[quote=“dvdnext, post:1, topic:296825”]hi, does someone has a afk command for 317 server?
i use garbo scape
i already had a afk command but it doesnt do anything
so if some can help me or send me a afk command
then 100X thanks
greetz dane[/quote]

Hey. I think you might want to use a health script so that is doesn’t change, and if somebody does attack you, automatically retaliates with Distrubution without your health changing. You also might want to automatically change username to “------ AFK” and for the client to say to the attacker “Don’t attack a player if he is AFK!”.

This is possible, just will take a bit of coding.

Zezima of Mithpkz.

Read full topic
